summary: NullReferenceException triggered when pressing [G] on suit during intro sequence
description: During the initial game introduction sequence, pressing [G] while interacting with the suit triggers a NullReferenceException and switches the player into drone view. This behavior is unintended, as the drone mode is deprecated and not part of the intro sequence.
steps: 1. Launch the game through Steam Client (Build 20951743).
2. Wait for intro video to finish.
3. Approach and interact with the suit embedded in the wall.
4. Press the 'G' key while interacting with the suit.
expected: Pressing 'G' while interacting with the suit does nothing; no errors occur and the player remains in normal view.
actual: A NullReferenceException occurs: 'Object reference not set to an instance of an object', and the player is switched into drone view.
